nodes.bodyText: We can re-write this to "User successfully created"

nodes.bodyText: I am not sure why we needed to make these variables as final?

It's not that it's needed. Just something I like to do. By making them final together with adding invariant checks such as null validation to the constructor we can make sure that after the constructor completes we have a fully initialized object.
